find_pairs_with_sum.name: find_pairs_with_sum
find_pairs_with_sum.description: Finds all pairs of integers in a list that sum up to a target value.

numerical_derivative.name: numerical_derivative
numerical_derivative.description: Estimates the derivative of a function at a given point using the central difference formula.

function.description: The function to calculate the derivative of.

x.description: The point at which to estimate the derivative.

draw_cards.name: draw_cards
draw_cards.description: Shuffles a standard deck of 52 cards and draws a specified number of cards from the top.

num_draw.description: The number of cards to be drawn. Defaults to 1.

cell_density.name: cell_density
cell_density.description: Calculates the cell density based on the optical density (OD) and dilution factor.

od.description: The optical density of the sample.

dilution.description: The dilution factor applied to the sample.

factor.description: The calibration factor for converting OD to cell density. Defaults to 1e9.

find_next_greater_element.name: find_next_greater_element
find_next_greater_element.description: Finds the next greater element for each element in a list.

euclidean_distance.name: euclidean_distance
euclidean_distance.description: Computes the Euclidean distance between two points in a 2D plane.

point_a.description: The coordinates of the first point (x, y).

point_b.description: The coordinates of the second point (x, y).

is_perfect_square.name: is_perfect_square
is_perfect_square.description: Checks if a number is a perfect square.

sort_numbers.name: sort_numbers
sort_numbers.description: Sorts a list of numbers in ascending or descending order.

numbers.description: The list of numbers to be sorted.

descending.description: If True, sorts the numbers in descending order. Defaults to False.

calculate_electric_field.name: calculate_electric_field
calculate_electric_field.description: Calculate the electric field produced by a charge at a certain distance.

charge.description: Charge in coulombs producing the electric field.

distance.description: Distance from the charge in meters where the field is being measured.

permitivity.description: Permitivity of the space where field is being calculated, default is 8.854e-12.

dice_roll_probability.name: dice_roll_probability
dice_roll_probability.description: Calculates the probability of rolling a specific sum with a given number of dice, each having a certain number of faces.

target_sum.description: The target sum to calculate the probability for.

num_dice.description: The number of dice being rolled.

num_faces.description: The number of faces on each die. Defaults to 6.

triangle_area.name: triangle_area
triangle_area.description: Computes the area of a triangle given its base and height.

base.description: The length of the base of the triangle.

final_velocity.name: final_velocity
final_velocity.description: Calculates the final velocity of an object given its initial velocity, acceleration, and time.

initial_velocity.description: The initial velocity of the object.

future_investment_value.name: future_investment_value
future_investment_value.description: Calculates the future value of an investment based on the present value, annual interest rate, and number of years.

present_value.description: The present value of the investment.

annual_interest_rate.description: The annual interest rate as a decimal (e.g., 0.05 for 5%).

years.description: The number of years the investment will grow.

neuronal_activity_rate.name: neuronal_activity_rate
neuronal_activity_rate.description: Calculates the neuronal activity rate based on the synaptic input rate, synaptic weight, and decay constant.

synaptic_input_rate.description: The rate of synaptic inputs per second.

synaptic_weight.description: The weight of the synaptic input, denoting its influence. Defaults to 1.0.

decay_constant.description: The rate at which the neuron's potential decays. Defaults to 0.1.

average.name: average
average.description: Calculates the arithmetic mean of a list of numbers.

solve_quadratic.name: solve_quadratic
solve_quadratic.description: Computes the roots of a quadratic equation given its coefficients.

a.description: The coefficient of the quadratic term (x^2).

b.description: The coefficient of the linear term (x).

is_power.name: is_power
is_power.description: Checks if a number is a power of a given base.

polygon_area_shoelace.name: polygon_area_shoelace
polygon_area_shoelace.description: Calculates the area of a polygon using the shoelace formula.

vertices.description: A list of polygon vertices represented as tuples (x, y).

bacterial_growth.name: bacterial_growth
bacterial_growth.description: Calculates the bacterial population after a given time based on the initial population and growth rate.

growth_rate.description: The growth rate per unit time.

doubling_time.description: The doubling time of the bacteria in minutes. Defaults to 20.

calculate_median.name: calculate_median
calculate_median.description: Calculates the median of a list of numbers.

std_deviation.name: std_deviation
std_deviation.description: Calculates the standard deviation of a list of numbers.

calculate_standard_deviation.name: calculate_standard_deviation
calculate_standard_deviation.description: Calculates the standard deviation of a list of numbers.

is_power_of_two.name: is_power_of_two
is_power_of_two.description: Checks if a number is a power of two.

calculate_investment_return.name: calculate_investment_return
calculate_investment_return.description: Calculates the return on investment based on the initial deposit amount, annual interest rate, and investment period.

interest_rate.description: The annual interest rate provided by the bank.

num_years.description: The number of years the money is invested.

binary_addition.name: binary_addition
binary_addition.description: Adds two binary numbers and returns the result as a binary string.

min_meeting_rooms.name: min_meeting_rooms
min_meeting_rooms.description: Finds the minimum number of meeting rooms required to accommodate all meetings.

intervals.description: A list of meeting time intervals, where each interval is represented as [start_time, end_time].

find_n_largest_numbers.name: find_n_largest_numbers
find_n_largest_numbers.description: Finds the n largest numbers in a list.

n.description: The number of largest numbers to find.

chi_square_independence_test.name: chi_square_independence_test
chi_square_independence_test.description: Performs a Chi-Square test for independence on a 2x2 contingency table.

contingency_table.description: A 2x2 contingency table represented as a list of lists.

significance_level.description: The significance level for the Chi-Square test. Defaults to 0.05.

get_product.name: get_product
get_product.description: Fetches product details from a RapidAPI endpoint using the provided product ID and RapidAPI key.

is_id.description: The ID of the product to retrieve information about.

loginuser.name: loginuser
loginuser.description: Logs a user into the system using the provided username and password.

password.description: The password for login in clear text.

circle_area.name: circle_area
circle_area.description: Computes the area of a circle given its radius.

batting_average.name: batting_average
batting_average.description: Calculates the batting average of a baseball player based on the number of hits and at-bats.

precision.description: The number of decimal places to round the batting average. Defaults to 3.

find_max_subarray_sum.name: find_max_subarray_sum
find_max_subarray_sum.description: Finds the maximum sum of a contiguous subarray within a list of integers.

reverse_string.name: reverse_string
reverse_string.description: Reverses the characters in a string.

generate_password.name: generate_password
generate_password.description: Generates a random password of specified length and character types.

length.description: The length of the password. Defaults to 12.

include_special.description: Whether to include special characters in the password. Defaults to True.

is_sum_of_cubes.name: is_sum_of_cubes
is_sum_of_cubes.description: Checks if a number is the sum of the cubes of its digits.

merge_sorted_lists.name: merge_sorted_lists
merge_sorted_lists.description: Merges two sorted lists into a single sorted list.

is_valid_ip_address.name: is_valid_ip_address
is_valid_ip_address.description: Checks if a string is a valid IP address (IPv4).

get_ip_zipcode.name: get_ip_zipcode
get_ip_zipcode.description: Retrieves the ZIP code of a given IP address using the ip-api.com API.

is_leap_year.name: is_leap_year
is_leap_year.description: Checks if a year is a leap year.

project_investment_growth.name: project_investment_growth
project_investment_growth.description: Projects the growth of an investment over a specified number of years.

annual_addition.description: The amount added to the investment annually.

years.description: The number of years to project the investment growth.

return_rate.description: The annual return rate as a decimal (e.g., 0.07 for 7%).

inflation.description: A list of annual inflation rates as decimals.

inflation_adjusted.description: Whether to adjust the final value for inflation. Defaults to True.

predict_forest_area.name: predict_forest_area
predict_forest_area.description: Predicts the change in forest area over a specified number of years.

location.description: The geographic location for the prediction.

num_years.description: The number of years into the future to make the prediction.

include_humans.description: Whether to include the impact of human activities in the prediction. Defaults to False.

get_ip_location.name: get_ip_location
get_ip_location.description: Retrieves the latitude and longitude coordinates of a given IP address using the ip-api.com API.

analyze_social_group_dynamics.name: analyze_social_group_dynamics
analyze_social_group_dynamics.description: Analyzes the social dynamics within a group based on the personality traits and group size.

extroverts.description: The number of extroverted members in the group.

introverts.description: The number of introverted members in the group.

assess_diabetes_risk.name: assess_diabetes_risk
assess_diabetes_risk.description: Assesses the risk of developing type 2 diabetes based on body mass index (BMI) and physical activity level.

activity.description: Physical activity level. Allowed values: "sedentary", "lightly active", "moderately active", or "very active".

structural_analysis.name: structural_analysis
structural_analysis.description: Performs structural analysis on a building based on its ID, floor numbers, and analysis mode.

building_id.description: The unique identifier of the building.

floor_numbers.description: The list of floor numbers to be analyzed.

analysis_mode.description: The mode of analysis, either "static" or "dynamic". Defaults to "static".

get_pokemon_move_info.name: get_pokemon_move_info
get_pokemon_move_info.description: Retrieves information about a Pokémon's move using the PokéAPI.

move_name.description: The name of the move to check. Defaults to "run".

get_city_from_zipcode.name: get_city_from_zipcode
get_city_from_zipcode.description: Retrieves the city name for a given ZIP code using the Ziptastic API.

zipcode.description: The ZIP code to look up.

search.name: search
search.description: This function performs a search query using the Market Intelligence by Automata API, returning information about related companies based on the provided search terms.

terms.description: Search terms separated by commas, which are used to filter the companies. Example: 'cloud computing,enterprise,security'.

page.description: Page number for paginated search results. Default is '0'. Example: '0', '1', '2', etc.

auto_complete.name: auto_complete
auto_complete.description: Fetch auto-complete suggestions based on a given term or phrase, with optional country specification.

prefix.description: The term or phrase to get auto-complete suggestions for.

country.description: The country code for the suggestions (e.g., 'it' for Italy, 'es' for Spain, 'pt' for Portugal). Defaults to 'it'.
